# cook your code here
def findOccurences(s, ch):
    return [i for i, letter in enumerate(s) if letter == ch]
 
t=int(raw_input())
while(t>0):
    n=int(raw_input())
    s=raw_input()
    i=0
    while(i<n):
        r=findOccurences(s,s[i])
        r=len(r)
        if(r%2==1):
            print(s[i])
            break
        i+=1
    t=t-1
